mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adminCourse(courseNum, userID, subject, content, cityNum, themeNum, period, hashtag, reg_date) VALUES (#{courseNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{cityNum}, #{themeNum}, #{period}, #{hashtag}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO adminCourseDetail (courseDetailNum, courseNum, course_seq, placeName, address, longitude, latitude, courseContent) VALUES (#{courseDetailNum}, #{courseNum} , #{course_seq}, #{placeName}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{courseContent})
INSERT INTO adminCourseImg (imageFileNum, courseNum, courseDetailNum, saveFileName) VALUES (adminCourseImg_seq.NEXTVAL, #{courseNum}, #{courseDetailNum}, #{saveFileName})
mapper.select: SELECT cityNum cityNum, cityName cityName FROM city ORDER BY cityNum
SELECT themeNum, themeName FROM theme ORDER BY themeNum

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT ac.courseNum, ac.userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, ac.cityNum, cityName, ac.themeNum, themeName, period, hashtag, TO_CHAR(ac.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date FROM adminCourse ac JOIN member m ON ac.userId = m.userId JOIN city c ON ac.cityNum = c.cityNum JOIN theme t ON ac.themeNum = t.themeNum
( INSTR(subject, #{keyword}) > 0 ) OR ( INSTR(content, #{keyword}) > 0 )
AND ( areaCode = #{areaCode} )
AND ( ac.themeNum = #{themeNum} )
AND (INSTR(hashtag, #{hashtag}) > 0)

ORDER BY ac.courseNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}
SELECT a.courseNum, placeName, course_seq courseSeq FROM adminCourseDetail a JOIN adminCourse b ON a.courseNum = b.courseNum WHERE a.courseNum = #{courseNum} ORDER BY courseSeq ASC
SELECT saveFileName FROM adminCourseImg a JOIN adminCourseDetail b ON a.courseDetailNum = b.courseDetailNum WHERE course_seq = 1 AND a.courseNum = #{courseNum}
